text:
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library into the Waiting Room, for the turn, this gains +X Power. X is the number of Level 1 or higher cards placed in the Waiting Room in this way times 1000. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect)
[C] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, choose 1 of your other ::Adolescence:: Characters, Rest it and move it to an empty Slot in the Back Row.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] CX COMBO When this attacks, if "Those Who Want Happiness" is in your Climax Zone, and you have 2 or more other ::Adolescence:: Characters, put up to 3 cards from the top of your Library into your Waiting Room, choose a Level X or lower ::Adolescence:: Character in your Waiting Room, return it to hand, and this gains +1 Level for the turn. X equals the number of ::Adolescence:: Characters put in the Waiting Room via this effect.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] CX COMBO [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room] When "Mini Live!" is placed in your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your other Characters and this, and for the turn those Characters gain the following ability. "[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this card's Damage is Cancelled, put the top card of your Library into the Waiting Room, and deal X Damage to your Opponent. X equals the Level of the card put in Waiting Room + 1." (Damage Cancel can occur. Climax cards are considered to be Level 0 for this effect)

[A] [(1) Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Climax card in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[S] [Rest 2 of your ::Adolescence:: Characters] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1)] At the beginning of your Opponent's Attack Phase, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Characters with "Sakuta" in the name and this card, Stand and Swap them.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of your Opponent, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] ASSIST All your Level 3 or higher Characters in front of this gain +2000 Power.
[C] RECOLLECTION If you have 3 or more cards in Memory, this gains the following 2 abilities. "[A] At the beginning of your Climax Phase, choose 1 of your Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that Character gains +500 Power." "[S] [Rest this] Draw a card, and discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room."

[C] If there are 2 or fewer Climax cards in your Waiting Room, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] RECOLLECTION If there are 3 or more cards in your Memory, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may put the top card of your Clock in the Waiting Room.

[C] If this is in the Front Row Center Slot, this gains +1 Soul.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put that Character in Stock. If so, put the bottom card of your Opponent's Stock in the Waiting Room.

[C] All your other ::Adolescence:: Characters gain +500 Power.
[A] When your Character's Trigger Check reveals a Climax card, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +2000 Power for the turn.

[A] [(1) Discard a card from hand to the Waiting Room, Send this to Memory] When this becomes Reversed in Battle, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Adolescence:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] Character Opposite this cannot move to another Slot.
[C] This cannot Side Attack.

[A] [(2) Return this to your hand] When this is Front Attacks, you may pay cost. If so, choose a "Mai Sakurajima, Reunion After a Long Time" or "Sakuta Azusagawa, Accident Avoidance" from your hand and place it in the Slot this was in as the Defending Character.
[A] [(2)] When this is placed from the Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, choose a Character with "Shoko" in name in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.

[C] All your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [Put the top card of your Library to Clock]".
[C] If there's a Marker under this, this gains +2500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, choose up to 1 "Sakuta Azusagawa, Divergence Point" in your hand, reveal it, and put it face-up under this as Marker.

[C] During your turn, this gains +1000 Power.
[A] RECOLLECTION When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 2 or more cards in Memory, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn that Character gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Adolescence:: Characters.

[A] When you use BACKUP of this, if all your Characters are ::Adolescence::, you may put the top card of your Library in Stock.
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 2000, Level 1 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[A] When this attacks, if the Level of the Character Opposite this is 3 or higher, this gains +6000 Power for the turn.
[A] CX COMBO When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, if "Disturbing Air" is in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and return it to their hand, and choose 1 ::Adolescence:: Character in your Waiting Room and put it to your Stock.

[A] When your other ::Adolescence:: Character attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Adolescence:: Characters.
[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Adolescence:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

Send this to Memory.
Reveal the top card of your Library. If it's either an ::Adolescence:: Character or an Event, put it in your hand. (Otherwise put it back where it was)
[C] RECOLLECTION During your turn, if this is in Memory, all your ::TRAIT:: Characters gain +500 Power.

[A] Search your Library for up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, shuffle your Library, choose up to 1 of your Opponent's Character, and return it to their hand.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains + Power for the turn. X equals the number of your Back Row ::Adolescence:: Characters time 1000.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Adolescence:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] All your other ::Adolescence:: Characters gain +1500 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to X cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room. X = # of your ::Adolescence:: Characters.

[C] ASSIST All your Characters in front of this gain +500 Power.
[S] [Rest 2 of your Characters] Choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put the top card of your Library to Stock."

[S] [Rest this] If this does not have a Marker under it, choose a Character with "Mai " in name in your Waiting Room and place it face-up under this as Marker.
[S] [(1) Put 1 Marker from under this into the Waiting Room, Rest this] Look at up to 3 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and put the remaining cards into the Waiting Room.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose a ::Adolescence:: Character in your Waiting Room and return it to your hand.
[A] When this becomes Reversed in battle, you cannot use "[A] ENCORE" for the turn. (This includes "[A] ENCORE (3)" provided by rules)

[A] [(1) Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Cost of the Battle Opponent of this is 0 or lower, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[A] CX COMBO When "Seaside Wedding Hall" is placed in your Climax Zone, if this is in the Front Row, all your other Characters gain the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may put the top card of your Library into Stock."
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Adolescence:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, look at up to 3 cards from top of your Library, choose up to 1 of them and put it in your hand, and put the rest in the Waiting Room.
[A] When this attacks, choose 1 of your ::Adolescence:: Characters, and that Character gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your ::Adolescence:: Characters.
[A] [Discard 2 Character cards from your hand to the Waiting Room] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may pay cost. If so, put that Battle Opponent in Clock.
[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".

[C] ASSIST All your ::Adolescence:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] CX COMBO When "Impossible Phenomenon" is placed in your Climax Zone, choose 1 of your other Characters, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, you may look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, put the remaining cards into the Waiting Room."

[C] For each of your other ::Adolescence:: Characters, this gains +500 Power.
[A] [(1)] At the start of Encore Step, if you have no other Rested Characters in the Front Row, you may pay cost. If so, Rest this.

[A] [Discard a Climax card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, choose 1 of your Opponent's Characters and Send it to Memory, and at the start of Encore Step, your Opponent puts that Character from his or her Memory in any Slot on the Stage.
[A] When this becomes Reversed, if the Level of the Battle Opponent of this is higher than the Level of the Opponent, you may put the top card of your Opponent's Clock in the Waiting Room. If so, put that Character in Clock.

[C] If you have 2 or more other ::Adolescence:: Characters, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] EXPERIENCE When this attacks, if the sum of the Levels of the cards in your Level Zone is 5 or more, choose 1 of your Characters, and for the turn, that Character gains +3000 Power.

[A] [(2)] When this is placed from Stage to the Waiting Room, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] CX COMBO [(1) Put a "Words Running Around" from your Climax Zone in the Waiting Room] When "Words Running Around" is placed in your Climax Zone, you may pay cost. If so, return all cards in your Waiting Room to your Library, and shuffle your Library.
[S] [Rest this] Choose 1 of your ::Adolescence:: Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] During your turn, if there's a Marker under this, this gains +2000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's a ::Adolescence:: Character, you may put it face-down under this as Marker. (If you don't, put it back where it was)

[A] RESONANCE [Reveal a "Sakuta Azusagawa, Sudden Change in Condition" from your hand] At the start of your Climax Phase, you may pay cost. If so, this gains +4000 Power for the turn.

[A] [Discard a ::Adolescence:: Character card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, search your Library for up to 1 "Shoko Makinohara, Abruptly at the Hospital", reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.
[S] [Discard a "Shoko Makinohara, Abruptly at the Hospital" from your hand to the Waiting Room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character from among them, show it to your Opponent, put it in your hand, and discard the remaining cards to the Waiting Room.

[A] When you use the BACKUP of this, choose 1 of your Characters in battle, and that Character gains the following ability for the turn. "[A] When the Battle Opponent of this becomes Reversed, send that Character to Memory."
[S] [Counter] BACKUP 3000, Level 2 [(1) Discard this card from your hand to the Waiting Room]

[C] EXPERIENCE If the total level of cards in your Level Zone is 5 or higher, this card gains +3000 Power.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, if you have 4 or more other ::Adolescence:: Characters, you may put the top card of your Library in your Stock.
Choose 1 of your Standing Characters with "Sakuta" in name and Rest it. If so, choose an ::Adolescence:: Character in your Clock and return it to hand. Send this to Memory.
[A] When this is placed from hand to the Climax Zone, choose up to 1 GREEN card in your Waiting Room and put it in your Stock, and all your Characters gain +1 Soul for the turn.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.
[C] All your Characters gain +1000 Power and +1 Soul.

[A] RECOLLECTION At the beginning of your Climax Phase, if you have 3 or more cards in Memory, choose 1 of your Characters, and until the next end of your Opponent's turn, that Character gains +500 Power.
[S] BRAINSTORM [(1) Rest this] Flip over the top 4 cards of your Library and put them in the Waiting Room. For each Climax card revealed this way, search your Library for up to 1 ::Adolescence:: Character, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle your Library.

[A] When this attacks, this gains +X Power for the turn. X = 500 times # of your other ::Adolescence:: Characters.

[C] If this is on the Stage, this is also considered to have "Kaede Azusagawa" as the name. (translation note: "Kaede" is in hiragana)
[A] [(1) Discard a ::Adolescence:: Character from hand to the Waiting Room] When this is played from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your Library, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it to your hand, and put the remaining cards in the Waiting Room.

[A] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, put the top 2 cards of your Library in your Waiting Room. If there were at least 1 Climax card among them, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1500 Power for the turn.

[C] All of your Opponent's Characters gain "[A] ENCORE [(2)]".

[C] RECOLLECTION If you have 3 or more cards in Memory, this gains +1500 Power and "[A] ENCORE [Discard a ::Adolescence:: Character from your hand to the Waiting Room]".
[A] [Discard a card from your hand to the Waiting Room] When this is placed from hand to the Stage, you may pay cost. If so, put the top card of your Clock in your Stock.

[A] This ability activates up to once per turn. When this becomes Reversed in battle, reveal the top card of your Library. If it's Level 2 or higher, you may Rest this. (Climax cards are considered Level 0 for this effect. Put the revealed card back where it was)

[C] If you have 4 or more ::Adolescence:: Characters, this gets -1 Level while in your hand.
[C] If you have no other ::Adolescence:: Characters, this does not Stand during your Stand Phase.

[C] If you have 1 or fewer other Characters, this gains +1 Level and +1000 Power.
[C] If you have 1 or fewer other Characters, all your other Characters gain +1 Level and +1000 Power.

[C] ASSIST All your ::Adolescence:: Characters in front of this gain +X Power. X = 500 times Level of that Character.
[A] When your Character Direct Attacks, choose 1 of your Characters, and that Character gains +1000 Power for the turn.
